pipesrus

Class Type2Pipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • pipesrus.Pipe
      • pipesrus.Type2Pipe

  • public class Type2Pipe
extends Pipe
    Individual class for Type 2 pipes, inherits nearly everything from Pipe. Largely identical to the other Type Pipe classes, but with validity criteria specific to Type 2 pipes.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class pipesrus.Pipe

        coloursValid, gradesValid, innerInsulation, outerReinforcement

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Type2Pipe()
      Blank constructor.
      Type2Pipe(double l, double d, int gO, int cO, boolean iI, boolean oR, boolean cR)
      Constructor with the credentials of the pipe.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class pipesrus.Pipe

        calcCost, returnDetails, setDiameter, setLength, setPlasticGrades, valid

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Type2Pipe

        public Type2Pipe()
        Blank constructor. Specific type 2 specs are initialised inside.

      • Type2Pipe

        public Type2Pipe(double l,
                 double d,
                 int gO,
                 int cO,
                 boolean iI,
                 boolean oR,
                 boolean cR)
        Constructor with the credentials of the pipe. Specific type 2 specs are initialised inside.
        Parameters:
        l - The length of the pipe in metres.
        d - The diameter of the pipe in inches.
        gO - The plastic grade ordered (grade 1-5).
        cO - The number of colours ordered (0, 1, or 2).
        iI - Whether or not inner insulation has been ordered (boolean).
        oR - Whether or not outer reinforcement has been ordered (boolean).
        cR - Whether or not chemical resistance has been ordered (boolean).
